title: Jordan Peterson and the Career Atheists: The Double Bind
description:
If the Career Atheists are more Christian than they want to admit JBP is more materialist than maybe he'd like to admit, at least on common sense truth. The Atheists inherit practice choice and moral responsibility through their past and JBP practices common sense realism as he goes about his daily life and does his science. 

Susan Blackmore and JBP on Free Will https://www.thebigconversation.show/exclusive-big-conversation-videos 

James Tour https://youtu.be/_zQXgJ-dXM4 
On Thomas Reid https://youtu.be/rk-op2VFbvY 
Thomas Nagel the Heretic https://www.weeklystandard.com/andrew-ferguson/the-heretic 
Mind and Cosmos https://www.amazon.com/Mind-Cosmos-Materialist-Neo-Darwinian-Conception/dp/0199919755
CS Lewis Miracles https://www.amazon.com/Miracles-C-S-Lewis-ebook/dp/B002BY77FY 

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

To support this channel/podcast on Patreon https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay
